description: NextPay is the leading non-bank merchant acquirer in Vietnam, providing payment, financial and management services to merchants and SMEs.
Nexu is disrupting the status quo by offering the most flexible auto finance products via a POS platform at car dealerships in the Mexican market.
Nimblr.ai is an artificial intelligence-powered assistant that manages healthcare appointments.
Niu Sushi is a chain of restaurants using innovative monitoring systems to control production and delivery processes.
NOLA Cupcakes began as Egypt’s first local cupcake store and has expanded its offerings to include savory products, personalized cakes and cupcakes, chocolates and beverages.
Noon Academy is a social platform that connects students with quality tutors on-demand and creates engaging online classrooms to supplement the regular curricula.
Nova Credit enables immigrants who move to the US to transport their credit history from their home country.
Novalogy’s first and staple product, AYO, is a pair of smart glasses used for light therapy to help people improve sleep, boost energy levels and beat jet lag.
Novo Agro connects agricultural producers with opportunities in technology, capital, knowledge and markets.
NovoPayment enables digital financial services across Latin America via its cloud-based, bank-grade proprietary Open Banking as a Service (BaaS) platform.
NOWDiagnostics is a diagnostics platform that uses a drop of blood or saliva to test for a variety of conditions, illnesses, and diseases with results in a matter of minutes.
NumberAI is a business messaging platform that enables SMEs to engage in two-way conversations with customers across different messaging services including SMS, Facebook and WhatsApp.
Nutraline manufactures and sells high-demand products like health supplements, dietary pills, and workout enhancements.
Nymcard is the first global virtual credit card targeting migrant populations, enabling payments for the next billion smart phones.
OBSS is a software development company specializing in software architecture, coding, project management, product design, and more.

Odd Industries has developed Odd Vision, a computer vision platform that leverages cloud and edge deep learning models trained on tens of millions of industrial images, to generate frictionless structured data with a focus on security, privacy, and avoiding bias.
Odilo is an intelligent platform from Spain that provides digital content to schools, libraries, and corporations.

OfficeRnD provides coworking spaces, flexible working spaces, and companies looking to implement a hybrid workplace with a space operating platform that increases operating efficiency and user engagement.
OFI is a managed service provider focused on digital transformation for companies in Latin America, specializing in workplace automation, platform management, and application management.
OhmniLabs is a robotics company that builds highly capable and affordable service robots using lean additive manufacturing techniques and a modular tech library.
